nodes.text: RP-G0 was an astromech droid in Industrial Automaton's R5 line that served in the Resistance during their conflict with the First Order. The droid was assigned to the Sullustan pilot Nien Nunb. Around thirty years after the Battle of Endor, it was stationed in the Resistance's base of operations on the planet D'Qar and took part in the preparation for their attack on the First Order's Starkiller Base superweapon. RP-G0 had red and white plating and stood 0.97 meters tall. It was equipped with a Burtt acoustic signaller.

RP-G0 first appeared in Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens, a film released in North America on December 18, 2015. It was not identified in the film, but received a designation in the reference book Star Wars: The Force Awakens: The Visual Dictionary, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo and released in conjunction with the film. Two droids with RP-G0's coloration can be seen in the same shot in the film, one of which is loaded into the T-70 X-wing starfighter opposite the Millennium Falcon on D'Qar prior to the Battle of Starkiller Base and the other of which can be seen on the ground beside the same X-wing. It is unclear which of these droids is RP-G0.
